TypeSignature.Value: .class nested protected auto ansi beforefieldinit UndoEngine/UndoUnit extends System.Object

summary.span: 封装用户可以撤消的工作单元。

span.span: Encapsulates a unit of work that a user can undo.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是中的一个嵌套类 ，它封装了用户可以撤消的操作。The class is a nested class within that encapsulates an action that a user can undo. 默认 实现监视更改通知，并为每个更改生成事件列表。The default implementation monitors change notifications and builds up a list of events for each change. 它使用保存这些事件 。It saves these events using . 直接从 多个方法接收有关更改的事件通知 `public virtual` 。An receives event notifications for changes directly from through several `public virtual` methods. 可以从派生 并执行任何其他逻辑。You can derive from and perform any additional logic. 如果需要，可以完全绕过默认 实现。If desired, you can completely bypass the default implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Close() cil managed
abstract member Close : unit -> unit override this.Close : unit -> unit

summary.span: 接收来自撤消引擎的调用以关闭此单元。

span.span: Receives a call from the undo engine to close this unit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关闭单元后，不能有更多事件进入其各种事件方法。When a unit is closed, no more events can come into its various event methods. 本身可能会采取措施来确保关闭当前打开的任何事件。The itself may take action here to ensure that any events that are currently open are closed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Undo() cil managed

span.span: Performs an undo or redo action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 撤消操作在撤消和重做状态之间切换，因此调用 两次会将对象恢复到其原始状态。Undo actions toggle themselves between undo and redo states, so calling twice sets the object back to its original state. 此 类最初假设撤消工作已完成，因此第一次调用时将 撤消工作。The class initially assumes that the undoable work has already been done, so the first call to undoes the work. 下一次调用会撤消上一个撤消操作，执行重做。The next call undoes the previous undo operation, performing a redo. 方法调用 方法来执行撤消操作。The method calls the method to perform an undo operation. 方法本身在中保持一致的状态 ，即使是在引发的异常的情况下也是如此 。The method itself works to maintain consistent state within the , even in the event of an exception thrown by .

para.span: 不要 直接调用方法; 如果需要，请重写，但应始终调用 方法来执行撤消工作。

span.span: Do not call the method directly; override it if you want, but always call the method to perform undo work.

para.span: 方法通知撤消引擎暂停撤消数据收集，直到当前的撤消操作完成。

span.span: The method notifies the undo engine to suspend undo data gathering until the current undo operation is completed.

para.span: 这会阻止创建新的撤消单元来响应此单元执行工作。

span.span: This prevents new undo units from being created in response to this unit doing work.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void UndoCore() cil managed
abstract member UndoCore : unit -> unit override this.UndoCore : unit -> unit

summary.span: 由 调用以执行撤消操作。

span.span: Called by to perform an undo action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用 方法来执行撤消操作。The method calls the method to perform an undo operation. 方法本身在中保持一致的状态 ，即使是在引发的异常的情况下也是如此 。The method itself works to maintain consistent state within the , even in the event of an exception thrown by .

para.span: 不要 直接调用方法; 如果需要，请重写，但应始终调用 方法来执行撤消工作。

span.span: Do not call the method directly; override it if you want, but always call the method to perform undo work.

para.span: 方法通知撤消引擎暂停撤消操作数据收集，直到当前的撤消操作完成。

span.span: The method notifies the undo engine to suspend undo-operation data gathering until the current undo operation is completed.

para.span: 这会阻止创建新的撤消单元来响应此单元执行工作。

span.span: This prevents new undo units from being created in response to this unit doing work.
